data.title: Greg Davies age, teeth, height, wife, parents, TV shows, worth
data.meta_description: GREG DAVIES is a British stand-up comedian and actor who is best known for his roles as Greg in We Are Klang, and Mr. Gilbert in The Inbetweeners. Read on!
data.text:
If you were a fan of the 2009 British comedy sketch show, We Are Klang, then the name Greg Davies must sound very familiar. He starred in the film alongside Steve Hall and Malek Larwood. He is also famous for his role as Mr Gilbert in The Inbetweeners and Ken Thompson in Cukoo.

So, who is Greg Davis? The article below will look at his age, parents, wife, height, teeth, career, and profile.

Greg Davies profiles

Name: Gregory Daniel Davis

Date of birth: May 14, 1968

Greg Davies age: 53 as of 2021

Zodiac sign: Taurus

Gender: Male

Nationality: British

Biography

He was born on May 14, 1968, in St Asaph, Flintshire. Greg Davies parents, who are Welsh, lived in England at the time, but his father, Bob, drove his mother, Pauline, across the border to Wales so that their son would qualify to be part of the Welsh national rugby team. His father was born in Porthmadog. He grew up in a small market town north of Shropshire called Wem. He has a sister named Rebecca. Like many others in North Wales, he is of the Owain Gwynedd.

Is Greg Davies related to Alex Horne?

No, Davies and Alex are not biologically related. However, they are very good friends who have worked on projects together, including the Taskmaster. This comedy panel show has won the BAFTA award.

Education

Davies went to Thomas Adams School in Wem and then later joined Brunel University in Uxbridge, London, where he studied English and Drama. What subject did Greg Davies teach? Before turning to comedy, he taught secondary school Drama and English at Langelywood School in Slough, Orleans Park School in Twickenham, and Sandhurst School in Sandhurst.

Greg Davies wife

The Welsh comedian was known to be dating Liz Kendall, a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament for Leicester West since 2010. Their relationship lasted for eight years before Liz announced that they had parted ways in 2015. Since then, both of them have kept their personal lives out of the limelight, and it is not known who they are dating.

Career

His career in filming began in 2005 when he appeared in the TV series Nelly Nut Live! Other Greg Davies TV shows and movies include:

Girls? Eugh!

The Musical Storytellers Ginger and Black

Saxondale

The Inbetweeners

We Are Klang

Ask Rhod Gilbert

Fast and Loose

The Inbetweeners Movie

Cuckoo

Man Down

This is Jinsy

The Inbetweeners 2

Taskmaster

Doctor Who

Travel Man

Asterix: The Mansion of the Gods

Who Do You Think You Are?

Your Magnificent Beast

Teen Titans Go! To The Movies

The Inbetweeners: Fwends Reunited

His latest project is the Taskmaster NZ, a New Zealand comedy panel show.

Davies also played a caricature of cricketer William Gilbert Grace in a series of adverts for Channel 4’s television coverage of the Ashes in 2005. He is a three-time nominee of the Chortle Awards in the categories Breakthrough Act, Best Sketch, Variety or Character Act, and Best Full-Length Show.

Greg Davies tour

The We Are Klang star has been around the world doing stand-up comedy. Some of the most recent UK tours dates he went on include the Matt and Co Comedy Show in November 2019 and The JDFR Spectacular in May 2019. Due to the ongoing world pandemic, he has not travelled, and all of his shows have been streamed online.

Greg Davies height

How tall is Greg Davies? The Welsh comedian stands at 6’ 8” (2.03m). He weighs 242.51lbs (110kg).

Net worth

Drawing most of his income from his appearances in movies and comedy, the Welsh star has gathered a net worth of about $5 million.

Greg Davies has created a name for himself in the UK comedy sector. He is an inspiration to all the upcoming comedians in England, and we wish him all the best in his endeavours.
